Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card
  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a triple triad card object. Used in decks cards hands etc. Modeled after the real life card. Triple Triad cards are square cards with "Ranks" on each edge of the card. Ranks of cards can range from 1 to 10 with 10 being represented by A. For gameplay purposes - not Collector's purposes - only the ranks of a card are important. In normal cases, cards have unique non-randomly generated ranks, however these ranks are randomly generated for demonstration purposes.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Keagen Thomson

            int rankLeft,
            java.lang.String owner)
        Constructor for objects of class Card
        Parameters:
        name - the card's unique name also used for its image
        rankTop - the rank at the top edge of the card. True for each respective rank
        owner - the owner of the card being played. changes when captured and determines color background

    • Method Detail

      • rotate

        public void rotate​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> ranks)
        Rotates ranks Clockwise by 1-Step. I may add "Hero power" functionality later that would make this useful. works by popping the top of a stack and unshifting the same value to the first index
